paper_abstract: This paper is devoted to the Cradle Theorem. It is a recursive description of a discrete vector field on the direct product of simplices endowed with the standard triangulation. The vector field provides an explicit deformation that is used to establish an algorithm for computing the Bousfield-Kan spectral sequence, more precisely to compute the homotopy groups for a 1-reduced simplicial abelian group.
paper_title: A Combinatorial Tool for Computing the Effective Homotopy of Iterated Loop Spaces
